translation.en: [man] "Koh amar," Evan.
-Sorry. One second, sorry. -[chanting stops]
Hello. Yeah.
Yeah, hold on. It's God. He wants his language back.
translation.zh: ‎是 先别挂 ‎上帝打来的 他想把他的语言要回去

translation.en: I'm sorry, Rabbi. I can't focus.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 拉比 我真没办法集中精神

translation.en: I feel like my whole life is a dumpster fire, and I'm only 12.
translation.zh:
‎我感觉自己这辈子就是一场灾难
‎我才12岁啊

translation.en: I don't even have a whole life yet.
I get it. No, it's rough. It's rough when your folks get divorced.
translation.zh:
‎我理解的 是啊
‎父母离婚确实是挺艰难的

translation.en: My mom went around the apartment cutting my dad's head out of all the photos.
translation.zh:
‎我妈在公寓里到处找照片
‎把我爸的脑袋从每一张里剪出去

translation.en: -No! -With her teeth.
[chuckles] Hey, we'll get through it all.
We'll study remotely. Bring your books to Indiana. It'll be fine.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以远程学习
‎把你的书都带到印第安纳去 没事的

translation.en: A Bar Mitzvah is the event that defines you.
translation.zh: ‎受诫礼可是定义你的大事件

translation.en: -The Jewish Super Bowl. -[chuckles]
What kind of killer party can I have in Indiana?
translation.zh:
‎我在印第安纳哪可能
‎办出什么像样的派对啊？

translation.en: -[door opens] -I don't even know anyone there.
[breathless] Hi, Rabbi Shapiro.
Jessica.
-Evan tells me you're doing well. -[Jessica] Oh yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-埃文跟我说你近来挺不错的
‎-可不是吗

translation.en: The weather's great at rock bottom.
-Kidding. -She's not kidding.
[quietly] I'm not kidding.
-Hey. We'll chat when you get there, okay? -Mm-hm. High five.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 到了那边后我们再聊好吗？
‎来击掌

translation.en: It's gonna be a long drive,
but Grandma is so excited that we're coming.
She's FaceTiming every five minutes.
translation.zh: ‎每五分钟就要拉我们视频一次

translation.en: At least I think it's her. All I see is neck.
translation.zh:
‎至少我觉得应该是她
‎因为我就只能看到个脖子

translation.en: That's me, Evan Goldman.
And I live at 224 West 92nd Street in the heart of New York City.
translation.zh:
‎我住在西92街224号
‎纽约的市中心

translation.en: I'm about to turn 13 and have my Bar Mitzvah.
translation.zh:
‎我马上就要13岁了
‎即将举行我的受诫礼

translation.en: It was gonna be the biggest party. My whole class was coming.
translation.zh:
‎原本这将是一场盛大的派对
‎全班同学都会到场

translation.en: Everything was going so well.
We had a happy family.
Until my dad met someone else, and my parents broke up.
translation.zh:
‎直到我爸遇见了别人
‎然后我的父母就分开了

translation.en: ♪ Picture me Just another cool kid ♪
translation.zh: ‎试想一下 我一个受欢迎的酷小子

translation.en: ♪ In NYC Near the park and the Met ♪
translation.zh: ‎住纽约市 公园与大都会两步就到

translation.en: ♪ Got my crew Everything was great ♪
translation.zh: ‎伙伴一大票 生活很美妙

translation.en: ♪ And I never knew Just how bad it would get ♪
translation.zh: ‎我可没想到 情况能变得如此糟糕

translation.en: ♪ Who'd have guessed Dad would ruin everything? ♪
translation.zh: ‎有谁能预料 老爸会将一切全毁掉

translation.en: ♪ Mom's depressed And her lawyers are mean ♪
translation.zh: ‎妈妈变抑郁 她的律师们也超级凶

translation.en: ♪ Now I'm stressed Life is a disaster ♪
translation.zh: ‎这下好焦虑 生活成了一场灾难

translation.en: ♪ And I'm cracking from the strain Going totally insane ♪
translation.zh: ‎压力让我难绷 眼看着要发疯

translation.en: ♪ And I'm just about to turn Just about to turn, just about to turn ♪
translation.zh: ‎而我马上就要 马上就要 马上就要…

translation.en: ♪ Thirteen! ♪
♪ Everything switches ♪
-♪ Thirteen! ♪ -♪ Everything turns around ♪
-♪ Thirteen! ♪ -♪ End up in stitches ♪
-♪ Thirteen! ♪ -♪ Hide away underground ♪
♪ Thirteen! ♪
♪ Can I get through it? ♪
-♪ Thirteen! ♪ -♪ Life'll change overnight ♪
-♪ Thirteen! ♪ -♪ How do I do it? ♪
-♪ Thirteen! ♪ -♪ Nothing is going right ♪
♪ The best and the worst And the most and the least ♪
translation.zh: ‎最好的与最坏的 最多的与最少的

translation.en: ♪ And the crazy and the scary And I'm standing on the edge! ♪
translation.zh:
‎疯狂的与可怕的
‎我正站在崩溃的边缘！

translation.en: [man] Hey, Evan.
Here's your stuff from the house.
You okay, kiddo?
I want to stay here. In my school. With my friends.
translation.zh:
‎我想留在这里 留在我的学校里
‎跟朋友们在一起

translation.en: Like, are we even still a family?
translation.zh: ‎我们现在到底还算不算一家人吗？

translation.en: Of course we are.
And we are working it all out.
It is going to be great.
Great.
Know what would've been great?
If you didn't blow everything up and ruin my life!
translation.zh: ‎可你却搞砸了一切 毁掉了我生活！

translation.en: Evan!
♪ Twelve years old Everything that used to be ♪
translation.zh: ‎十二岁时 曾经拥有的那段

translation.en: ♪ Good as gold Starts to crumble and crack ♪
translation.zh: ‎美好日子 分崩离析正开始

translation.en: ♪ Pressure mounts Once it was a joke ♪
translation.zh: ‎压力在加大 曾经的一个玩笑

translation.en: ♪ Now it really counts And there's no turning back ♪
translation.zh: ‎如今已成真 过去再也回不了

translation.en: -♪ Life goes wrong ♪ -♪ Suddenly they're yelling ♪
translation.zh:
‎-生活出意外
‎-突然他们吼起来

translation.en: ♪ That your hair's too long Or your room isn't clean ♪
translation.zh:
‎不是说你头发太长
‎就是你的房间太脏

translation.en: -♪ Roll along ♪ -♪ Every conversation ♪ ♪ Is another lost cause ♪
translation.zh:
‎-一路滑过去
‎-每段对话不是没希望的徒劳

translation.en: ♪ Or a list of my flaws And I'm just about to turn ♪
translation.zh:
‎就是细数我缺陷的列表
‎而我马上就要

translation.en: ♪ Just about to turn God, I'm gonna turn 13! ♪
translation.zh: ‎马上就要 天啊 我要十三岁了！

translation.en: -♪ What am I doing? ♪ -♪ Thirteen! ♪
-♪ Who am I gonna be? ♪ -♪ Thirteen! ♪
-♪ Somebody listen ♪ -♪ Thirteen! ♪
♪ Somebody talk to me ♪
♪ Why is my life a complete disaster? How did things get so far off track? ♪
translation.zh:
‎为何我的生活成了一场大灾难？
‎一切是如何偏离了正轨？

translation.en: ♪ How can I not go to Indiana? How do I get my family back? ♪
translation.zh:
‎我要怎样才不用去印第安纳？
‎要怎样才能找回我的家？

translation.en: ♪ I wanna fly, wanna run, wanna drive Wanna get rich, wanna get mad ♪
translation.zh: ‎我想飞翔 想开车 想奔跑 ‎想发财 想发怒 想要逃

translation.en: ♪ Wanna get out, wanna get my braces off Wanna get my nose pierced ♪
translation.zh: ‎想发财 想发怒 想要逃 ‎想打个鼻钉 想把我的牙套脱掉

translation.en: ♪ Wanna grow my hair long But all I keep hearing is ♪
translation.zh:
‎想把头发养长
‎可我整天听到的话却是

translation.en: ♪ No, you're not ready! No, it's not time yet! ♪
translation.zh:
‎不 你还没准备好！
‎不 时机还没有到！

translation.en: ♪ No, it's not right now! Wait until you're older! ♪
translation.zh:
‎不 现在就做不太好！
‎等你年纪再大一些！

translation.en: ♪ No, you're not ready! No, it's not time yet! ♪
translation.zh:
‎不 你还没准备好！
‎不 时机还没有到！

translation.en: ♪ No, it's not right now! Wait until you're older! ♪
translation.zh:
‎不 现在就做不太好！
‎等你年纪再大一些！

translation.en: ♪ No, you're not ready! No, it's not time yet! ♪
translation.zh:
‎不 你还没准备好！
‎不 时机还没有到！

translation.en: ♪ No, it's not right now! Wait until you're older! ♪
translation.zh:
‎不 现在就做不太好！
‎等你年纪再大一些！

translation.en: ♪ Homework! Laundry! Dishes! Courses! ♪
translation.zh:
‎回家作业！洗衣服！
‎洗碗碟！课外班！

translation.en: ♪ Just settle down and hold your horses! ♪
What were you thinking?
You scared me. You can't just run away.
translation.zh: ‎把我给吓的呀 你不能就这样逃跑吧

translation.en: Isn't that what you're doing?
No! That's… It's different.
-Evan. Honey. -[Evan] I know, Mom.
translation.zh:
‎-埃文 亲爱的
‎-我知道了 妈妈

translation.en: "We'll get through it. It'll be fine. You'll make new friends."
translation.zh:
‎“我们会挺过去的 没事的
‎你会交到新朋友的”

translation.en: I just wanted to make sure you went to the bathroom before we left.
translation.zh:
‎我只是想问一下
‎你要不要在我们出发前先上个厕所

translation.en: Oh, I-- I'm good.
Good, but all that other stuff too.
translation.zh: ‎好 当然还有你刚才说的那些

translation.en: Mom, I hate this.
And I hate that Dad met someone else.
I know, kiddo. Me too.
translation.zh: ‎我明白 孩子 我也是

translation.en: We'll get through this.
♪ Just about to turn Just about to turn ♪
♪ Just about to turn Just about to turn 13! ♪
translation.zh: ‎马上就要 马上就要十三岁了！

translation.en: -♪ Something is coming ♪ -♪ Thirteen! ♪
-♪ Something is blowing up ♪ -♪ Thirteen! ♪
-♪ Something is humming ♪ -♪ Thirteen! ♪
-♪ Somebody's growing up ♪ -♪ Thirteen! ♪
♪ Thirteen! ♪
♪ Thirteen! ♪
♪ Thirteen! ♪
♪ The best and the worst And the most and the least ♪
translation.zh: ‎最好的与最坏的 最多的与最少的

translation.en: ♪ And the crazy and the scary And we're just about to turn 13! ♪
translation.zh:
‎疯狂的与可怕的
‎而我们马上要十三岁了！

translation.en: Oh! Look at that stunning sunset.
No buildings. No smog. No stress.
translation.zh: ‎没有高楼 没有雾霾 没有压力

translation.en: No people. Literally no people.
translation.zh: ‎也没有人 真的连一个人都没有

translation.en: Thank God. I was so worried.
translation.zh: ‎谢天谢地 我都担心死了

translation.en: How was that drive?
Oh. You look terrible.
What? Hug your mother already.
I'm okay, Mom.
You're not. A mother knows.
translation.zh: ‎你有事 做妈妈的能看出来

translation.en: Evan. Evan! [laughs]
Hi, Grandma.
What?
I'm fine.
You're not. A grandma knows. Come on.
translation.zh: ‎你有事 做外婆的能看出来 快进来吧

translation.en: Wow, this place looks exactly the same.
translation.zh: ‎哇 这里看上去真是一点也没变

translation.en: [Grandma] I'm surprised you remember.
You haven't been here since you were five,
translation.zh: ‎你五岁之后就再也没来过了

translation.en: but if it took a divorce to get you to come back, maybe it's a good thing.
translation.zh:
‎但如果要离次婚才能让你回来
‎兴许还是件好事呢

translation.en: -Mom! -What? I look at the bright side.
translation.zh:
‎-妈妈！
‎-怎么啦？我爱往好的一面看嘛

translation.en: -Come on, I'll show you your room. -[Evan] All righty.
translation.zh:
‎-来吧 我带你看看房间
‎-好嘞

translation.en: -[Grandma] I'll take the bag. -[Evan] Okay.
[Grandma] Oh my God, it's heavy. What do you have in here, rocks?
translation.zh:
‎我的天啊 好重
‎你这里面都装了些什么啊 石头吗？

translation.en: Your room.
Was this my mom's room?
[Grandma] Yes, it was, but I've been using it as a yoga studio,
translation.zh:
‎对 曾经是
‎但我后来就一直把它当做瑜伽室在用

translation.en: so that might be what you smell. Sorry.
translation.zh:
‎所以你闻到的味道
‎可能是因为这个 抱歉

translation.en: Evan.
I know you'll miss your friends
translation.zh: ‎我知道你会想念你的朋友们

translation.en: and school and bagels.
But give it a chance.
When your grandfather brought me here, I didn't think I'd ever get used to it.
translation.zh:
‎当年你外公把我带过来时
‎我心想我是一辈子都不会适应这里的

translation.en: But 50 years later, he's dead,
and I'm still here buying my bras, eggs, and tires all in one store.
translation.zh:
‎我却依旧在这里
‎去同一家店里买胸罩、鸡蛋和轮胎

translation.en: I love you.
And not just because I have to.
translation.zh: ‎而且不仅是因为我是你外婆

translation.en: [sighs] This entire year has been lawyers and therapists and… carbs,
translation.zh:
‎这一整年都在穿梭于律师啊
‎心理医生啊还有… ‎碳水之间

translation.en: and every mom on the Upper West Side asking, "How are you?"
translation.zh:
‎而且上西区的每个妈妈都在问：
‎“你还好吗？”

translation.en: [sighs] I needed out.
[Grandma] So you're out.
Now you can start over. Do whatever you want.
translation.zh:
‎这下你就能重头开始
‎做任何你想做的事了

translation.en: You could finally write again, huh?
translation.zh: ‎你终于可以重新开始写作了吧？

translation.en: Mom. Give me a little time, okay?
Take all the time you need. Who am I to judge?
translation.zh:
‎你尽管慢慢来
‎我有什么资格说三道四？

translation.en: But, ticktock.
I'm just saying.
How can anyone sleep with all this quiet?
translation.zh: ‎这么安静 谁能睡得着啊？

translation.en: Good morning, honey. Put away your video game.
translation.zh: ‎早上好 亲爱的 把游戏放下

translation.en: [Grandma] So, Evan,
I was thinking about your Bar Mitzvah.
translation.zh: ‎我在想该怎么给你办受诫礼

translation.en: Okay, just curious.
How many other Jews are there in Walkerton?
If you include us?
Us.
Is there a temple?
There is. It's called a church.
So we'll do the party in the backyard.
translation.zh: ‎这样 我们就在后院里办派对

translation.en: Oh, and I've got a boom box. You can make me a mixtape.
translation.zh:
‎噢 我正好有个手提大音箱
‎你可以帮我录盘混音带

translation.en: What's a mixtape?
Also, I'm new here.
If my party is awful, I'll never live it down.
translation.zh:
‎如果我的派对办得很糟
‎大家肯定忘不了

translation.en: I know it's important. We will make it good, I promise.
translation.zh: ‎我明白这件事很重要 ‎我们一定会办好的 我保证

translation.en: It needs to be better than good.
Okay. Tell you what. I'll plan it.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 要不这样 我来策划

translation.en: -You'll plan it? -Yes.
-You? -Yes.
-[Jessica] Really? -[Evan] Yes, really.
So it can be everything that I want.
translation.zh: ‎这样才能确保一切都是我想要的样子

translation.en: -Fine. -Good.
-Good. -Good.
-See? -[door opens] This is family.
[girl] Miss Ruth!
-Am I interrupting? -[all] No!
Uh, hi, Miss Ruth.
Patrice. Perfect.
This is my daughter, Jessica.
And I know it's been a while, but you and Evan remember each other, yes?
translation.zh:
‎我知道已经过了好久
‎但你和埃文还记得对方的 是吧？

translation.en: -[Evan] No. -[Patrice] Not really.
Miss Ruth, I came by to return your book.
The Bell Jar.
Oh, this book made me wanna be a writer.
translation.zh: ‎就是这本书让我想当作家的

translation.en: Isn't it a little sad?
What's sad is you're the only one around here who knew it was sad.
translation.zh:
‎真正悲伤的是
‎这里只有你一个人知道这本书悲伤

translation.en: -Patrice, maybe you can show Evan around. -[Patrice] Sure.
translation.zh:
‎-帕特里斯 要不你带埃文四处转转？
‎-好啊

translation.en: Great.
-Wanna take some toast? -[Evan] I'm good.
Okay.
-That's a cool shirt. -Thanks.
I try to warn people here that they're destroying our wildlife with landfills.
translation.zh:
‎我努力警告这里的人们
‎垃圾填埋场正在毁灭我们的野生动物

translation.en: -And how's that going? -Landfills are part of the tour.
translation.zh:
‎-效果怎么样啊？
‎-垃圾填埋场是这里的景点之一

translation.en: Patrice! Patrice!
-Is that Evan? -Yeah. Evan, this is Archie.
translation.zh:
‎-这是埃文吗？
‎-是啊 埃文 这位是阿奇

translation.en: -Hey, Archie. -[Archie] I know what you're thinking.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 阿奇
‎-我知道你在想什么

translation.en: Yep, I'm faking it.
I'm gonna show Evan around.
This is around. Let me know if you run into Kendra.
translation.zh: ‎到这儿算转完了吧 ‎要是遇上了肯德拉一定告诉我啊

translation.en: -Wait, who's Kendra? -An angel walking amongst us mere mortals.
translation.zh:
‎-等等 肯德拉是谁？
‎-一位行走在我等凡人中的天使

translation.en: -Cool. I can't wait to meet her. -[Patrice laughs]
translation.zh: ‎酷 我等不及要见见她呢

translation.en: I'm not planning on running into Kendra. We'll see you later.
translation.zh: ‎我可没打算碰见肯德拉 回头见啦

translation.en: [Archie] Fine.
I'll be here.
[dramatically] Alone.
The one child left behind.
-Don't fall for it. -See you later, Archie!
[Archie] Welcome to Walkerton.
If someone offers to pray for you, let them.
translation.zh: ‎如果有人提出要为你祈祷就让他们吧

translation.en: -So what is there to do around here? -Not much.
translation.zh:
‎-那么 你们这儿都有些什么活动啊？
‎-不多

translation.en: Yesterday I finished YouTube.
It's not nearly as exciting as your life in New York.
translation.zh: ‎肯定没有你在纽约的生活刺激啊

translation.en: Exciting, right.
My dad gets a midlife crisis, and I get mid-America.
translation.zh:
‎我爸遇上了中年危机
‎我却来到了美国中部

translation.en: Now I have to have my Bar Mitzvah in Walkerton, Indiana.
translation.zh:
‎这下我要在印第安那州沃克顿
‎办我的受诫礼了

translation.en: For us Jews, it's the one day that's supposed to be happy and perfect.
translation.zh:
‎对我们犹太人来说
‎这天应该是快乐的 完美的

translation.en: See, Catholics don't have that day.
translation.zh: ‎天主教徒们可没有这样的一天

translation.en: It would go against everything we believe in.
translation.zh: ‎这与我们所信仰的一切背道而驰

translation.en: [Evan] Back home, your party defines you.
translation.zh: ‎在我家那儿 你的派对能定义你

translation.en: Hey, you help with my petition to phase out single-use plastic,
translation.zh:
‎嘿 你帮我搞
‎逐步淘汰一次性塑料的请愿活动

translation.en: and I'll help you plan your party.
Deal. And I'll make that my Mitzvah project.
translation.zh: ‎成交 我就把这当做我的善行项目

translation.en: Your what?
When you have a Bar Mitzvah,
translation.zh: ‎这样的 当你要办受诫礼时

translation.en: you get to pick a charity project that helps others.
translation.zh: ‎你有机会选一个帮助他人的慈善项目

translation.en: This is all working out.
We'll find the best DJ at the best ballroom at the best hotel.
translation.zh:
‎我们要找最好的DJ和最好的酒店
‎在最好的舞厅里办

translation.en: -Which is the Best Western. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-那就是最佳西方酒店咯
‎-什么？

translation.en: Okay, where to start?
♪ Down the road, there's a Dairy Queen Up the block, there's a Walmart ♪
translation.zh:
‎沿路走下去 是冰雪皇后一家
‎这方向上去 还有一间沃尔玛

translation.en: ♪ There's a place You can accessorize your pets ♪
translation.zh: ‎还有个给你宠物买东西的地方

translation.en: ♪ A school, a tree, a couple of churches And no matter how hard anybody searches ♪
translation.zh:
‎一棵树、几间教堂、一所学校
‎无论是派谁来仔细寻找

translation.en: ♪ That's about as thrilling As this dumbest village gets ♪
translation.zh: ‎这个傻村庄也就这么点花样

translation.en: ♪ It's the lamest place in the world ♪ ♪ But it just got a little bit better ♪
translation.zh:
‎这里是全世界最蹩脚的地方
‎但它刚变好了一些些

translation.en: ♪ So don't disappear ♪
♪ It's the lamest place in the world ♪
translation.zh: ‎这里是全世界最蹩脚的地方

translation.en: ♪ But I'm pretty sure It's not as lame as it was before ♪
translation.zh: ‎但我很确信它至少有好过从前

translation.en: ♪ Now that you're here ♪
Come on, I'll show you the hillside where everyone waits for the resurrection.
translation.zh:
‎快来吧 我带你去看
‎大家等耶稣复活的那个山坡

translation.en: And tomorrow, I can show you the haunted barn.
translation.zh: ‎明天呢 我带你去看一个闹鬼的谷仓

translation.en: ♪ Forty miles to the nearest river Sixty miles to the airport ♪
translation.zh:
‎这头60公里是最近的河
‎那头100公里是机场

translation.en: ♪ When we plan our escape That's where we're gonna have to be ♪
translation.zh:
‎当我们计划逃跑时
‎那就是我们得去的地方

Sit.

-Yeah, he's right here. -My friend's here. I gotta go.

about wanting me to come for the Bar Mitzvah?
I will ask him again.
Is he gonna be okay?
Now? [scoffs]

[Archie] Hey, Patrice!
Patrice!

How Come You Haven't Answered My Texts.
Duh.

Sorry about your parents breaking up.

‎我觉得对我来说最艰难的部分
‎就是要离开家

‎我的一切都在这里

♪ Kendra over there ♪

If you both wanna kiss so much, just kiss.

Checkmate.

♪ Friday night! ♪
Friday night? This is awesome. What do you think, Kendra?

Why don't you want Brett and Kendra to k--

Of course,
Kendra's my best friend, and I could never hurt her, so…

-[whistle blows] -[Brett] Set!
[Kendra] All right, everyone, let's try this again. Ready, Lucy?

-Hey, Archie. How you doing? -Pretty good.

‎-嘿 阿奇 你好吗？
‎-挺好的

translation.en: I guess Patrice is still pretty mad at me, huh?
translation.zh: ‎看来帕特里斯还在生我的气 是吧？

‎你为了那帮家伙抛下了她

Oh! Cute shirt, Archie.
Did you see that?
Way to play it cool, Arch.
If I could have ten minutes sitting next to her,
translation.zh: ‎要是我能坐在她身旁 哪怕就十分

-Does she know you like her? -Oh.
I think she misinterpreted my flirting for food poisoning.

‎当成了食物中毒

Next to her in the next seat at the movies on Friday.

‎周五看电影的时候

Here's the thing. Lucy is holding my party hostage

‎露西拿我的派对威胁我

translation.en: unless I stop Brett and Kendra from kissing.
translation.zh: ‎要我阻止布雷特和肯德拉接吻

translation.en: Okay, I'm listening.
All right, it's pretty complicated, but hear me out.
translation.zh: ‎好嘞 计划挺复杂的 但听我细细道来

translation.zh: ‎如果安排你坐到肯德拉的另一边…

translation.en: -I'm in! -There's more.
Okay, keep going.
Then, at the perfect moment, you faint on Kendra's shoulder,
translation.zh:

‎你晕倒在肯德拉的肩膀上

translation.en: drawing her attention and blocking Brett from kissing her.
translation.zh: ‎吸引她的注意 阻止布雷特吻她

translation.en: Oh! And I get to kiss Kendra instead.
What? No. The plan is,
you make a scene and block the kiss, and no one will get mad at you because--

‎你演一场戏阻止那一吻
‎而且不可能有人会生你的气 因为…

translation.en: Because I'm charming.
Yeah, that.
Lucy gets what she wants, and everyone comes to my party.
translation.zh:
‎露西能如愿以偿
‎这样大家都会来参加我的派对了

translation.en: And I get to kiss Kendra.
You keep saying that as though it's part of the plan.

‎你一直这么说
‎就好像这是计划中的一部分似的

translation.en: It's not.
You saved all my old journals?
translation.zh: ‎你把我所有的旧日记都保留了下来？

translation.en: I thought I told you to throw out all my old stuff?
translation.zh:
‎我不是告诉过你
‎把我所有的旧东西都扔掉吗？

translation.en: When did you say that?
When I left home and said, "Throw out all my old stuff."
translation.zh:
‎我离开家的时候 我说：
‎“把我所有的旧东西都扔掉”

translation.en: -Oh! Jess. -Mom.
Jess. [sighs]
-You know what I miss? -Subtlety? [sighs]
Teaching.
It gave me purpose.
You were really good at it.
You went to college, worked harder than anyone, and earned your BFA.
translation.zh:
‎你去上了大学 比任何人都刻苦
‎拿到了你的本科学位

translation.en: You were a writer. That was your purpose.
translation.zh:
‎你以前是个作家
‎那才是你人生的意义

translation.en: And if it took a divorce to light a fire under your tuchus,
translation.zh:
‎如果需要一场离婚
‎才能逼你行动起来的话

translation.en: maybe that's a good thing.
-I'm just saying, again. -[Jessica sighs].
I'm gonna get some stuff then I'm gonna hang out with Archie.
translation.zh: ‎我去拿点东西 然后就去跟阿奇玩

translation.en: No, wait-- Oh no-- We're supposed to have dinner together.
translation.zh: ‎不 等等 不是说好一起吃晚饭的吗？

translation.en: And you have a Hebrew lesson.
-I'll reschedule it for tomorrow. -No-- Evan. Whoa, whoa, whoa. Come back.
translation.zh:
‎-我会改到明天的
‎-不 埃文 回来

translation.zh:
‎你每晚都放我们鸽子
‎也不肯接你爸的电话

translation.en: You haven't talked to me about your Bar Mitzvah.
translation.zh:
‎你到现在都没跟我聊过
‎你受诫礼有什么打算

translation.en: And now, skipping lessons?
-What is going on? -Nothing.
You wanted to move here and for me to make new friends,
translation.zh:
‎是你想让我搬来这里
‎想让我交新朋友的

translation.en: so here I am, making new friends.
-At least I'm trying. -Look, this is about you.
translation.zh:
‎-至少我在努力 你呢？
‎-听着 我们在说你呢

translation.en: You will do your lesson with the rabbi, and then you will see your friends.
translation.zh:
‎你必须要跟拉比上课
‎上完课再见你的朋友们去

translation.en: You're his mother.
He's watching what you do.
translation.zh: ‎你做什么 他都看在眼里

translation.en: -That's all I've got to say. -[quietly] Yeah.
I doubt that.
Archie! Archie!
-I can't talk right now. -[Patrice] Do you wanna come for dinner?
translation.zh:
‎-我现在不方便说话 帕特里斯
‎-你要不要来一起吃晚饭啊？

translation.en: I've got a whole list of movies where Americans do bad English accents.
translation.zh:
‎我准备了一个电影列表
‎里面全是美国人拙劣地模仿英国口音

translation.en: All right, fine, you broke me. We're all going to The Bloodmaster.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我坦白
‎我们要一起去看《血王》了

translation.en: Evan made a plan where I block Brett from kissing Kendra
translation.zh:
‎埃文想了个计划
‎让我阻止布雷特吻肯德拉

translation.en: so Lucy will bring everyone to his party.
translation.zh:
‎这样露西就会带大家
‎来参加他的派对了

translation.en: Wait, Evan is using you just to save his party?

‎等等 埃文这样利用你

[sarcastically] Hmm. You find a 6,000-year-old language confusing. Now I see the problem.

‎你以为学这个会很容易
‎那是你消息不灵通

One moment.
God, [laughs] you're gonna love this. No, it's Goldman again.

‎上帝 你肯定会笑死的
‎对 又是高德曼

‎你想让我搬出拉比那一套来吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna go full rabbi. Kippah coming on. Boom.

‎我要拿出拉比的样子来了
‎要戴圆顶小帽了 砰

translation.en: [whispers] Respect. Respect the yarmulke.

translation.en: Look, I'm not here to tell you what you should or shouldn't do, okay?

‎听着 埃文 我不是要告诉你该做什么
‎不该做什么

translation.en: You gotta find your own way. I just…
translation.zh: ‎好吗 你的路要靠自己找 我只是…

translation.en: I've just walked a few more steps than you,
translation.zh: ‎我只是比你多走了几步而已

translation.en: and maybe I can help you stumble a few less than I did.
translation.zh:
‎或许我能帮助你少跌几跤
‎不要像我以前一样

translation.en: Really, I'm not avoiding my lesson.
It's your choice. But listen to this, okay?
translation.zh:
‎选择权在你手上
‎但听我说一句 好吗？

translation.en: Look, how you do one thing is how you do everything,
translation.zh:
‎听说 你做一件事的方式
‎决定了你怎么做所有事

translation.en: and what you're not doing is learning your haftorah.
translation.zh:
‎而你不在做的事
‎就是好好学哈夫塔拉

translation.en: Seriously. It's not even Hebrew. You sound like an injured dolphin.
translation.zh:
‎说真的 根本都不能算希伯来语
‎你听上去就像是只受了伤的海豚

translation.en: [high voice] Really? Oh.
We'll talk soon.
Peace out, Flipper.

♪ Gotta look real hot 'Cause it's Friday night ♪

♪ I'm getting ready today I'm getting ready to say ♪

translation.zh: ‎“我一点也不怪 不是你以为的阿呆”

♪ Big night tonight Then everyone comes to my Bar Mitzvah ♪

‎大家都会来参加我的受诫礼

‎大家都会来参加我的受诫礼

‎-那大家就都会来参加我的派对

-♪ Something that makes them ♪ -♪ Something that makes her ♪

‎-做完后她终于会

♪ Nothing can stop me tonight ♪
♪ I'm getting ready ♪
♪ Ready ♪
♪ Ready ♪

‎-不 不用了…

‎-埃文成功了

-Hey, what's up? -[Malcolm] Hey, Carlos.

[girl 2] Yeah, I'm kinda nervous.

‎-我都不敢相信你竟然成功了

ready for an opportunity like this.
